message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your appreciation for the product and to ensure you secure it at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
